testcase.classname: Testing Happy Path testing for Demoblaze app
testcase.name: Validate User can signup with Demoblaze application
testcase.failure:
Given I click on Signup on the page.........................................failed And I enter username........................................................skipped And I enter password........................................................skipped And I click Sign up button..................................................skipped Then I should received a "Sign up successful." popup message................skipped

testcase.classname: Testing Happy Path testing for Demoblaze app
testcase.name: Validate User can place successful order with Demoblaze application
testcase.failure:
Given I can login successfully into the application.........................failed When I select the product from Product Store page...........................skipped And I click Add to cart button..............................................skipped Then I should received Product added popup message..........................skipped When I click Cart button from the navbar menu...............................skipped And I click Place Order.....................................................skipped And I enter name as "Pranjal"...............................................skipped And I enter country as "Mexico".............................................skipped And I enter city as "Huixquilucan"..........................................skipped And I enter credit card as "4747474747474747"...............................skipped And I enter month as "1"....................................................skipped And I enter year as "2023"..................................................skipped And I click Purchase button.................................................skipped Then I should see "Thank you for your purchase!" popup message..............skipped When I click Ok button......................................................skipped Then I should be redirected to Product Page.................................skipped
